product_name: Nite Ize Tone Wide Sport Case
long_description: The Nite Ize Tone Wide Sport Case helps keep wider smart phones close at hand, securing it right at your side. Case is built from a tough nylon material that resists abrasion for lasting service. Stretch nylon side panels expand to accommodate various thicknesses of cell phones or other electronic devices. Strong plastic clip secures to belts or webbing up to 2 in. wide. The Nite Ize Tone Wide Sport Case secures with a rip-and-stick flap closure.
short_description: The Nite Ize Tone Wide Sport Case helps keep wider smart phones close at hand, securing it right at your side.
